title: Person of Interest - Season 03 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC ENG
description:
A former CIA agent who everyone thought was dead is recruited by a billionaire, with the aim of preventing crimes. John Reese, a beggar in the day today is overseen by Mr. Finch and his martial skills do not go unnoticed. Mr. Fitch is responsible for the creation of a highly advanced technology to identify participants in crimes before they even happen. But the whole system is fallible and it can not identify the person as a victim or perpetrator, and that's where John. From the same creator of Lost, and the writer of Batman: The Dark Knight, Person of Interest promises to be an electrifying and full of mystery drama.
